DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether ultrasound study of the airway to predict endotracheal tube size in anesthetized pediatric patients better than the tube size formula
DOC.brief_title: Ultrasound Study of the Airway to Predict Endotracheal Tube Size in Anesthetized Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: Age 16 Years ASA class 12 Elective Surgery GA with oral uncuff endotracheal tube Potential difficult air way from history and physical exam Allergy ti ultrasound gel neck mass unstable vital sign
